author: craigmcc
msg: Write a reference document describing the details of using all of the
custom tags included in Struts.  Migrate the descriptive text out of the
"struts.tld" file (where nobody was likely to find it anyway :-).  The
new page is part of the "struts-documentation.war" web application.
Tweak the behavior of the <struts:errors> and <struts:message> tags to

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify scripts to support packaging and uploading nightly releases
of Struts to the Jakarta web server.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'jakarta'.
